thread.title: BRIEF-Coupa Software Reports Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.02

title: BRIEF-Coupa Software Reports Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.02
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:10 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Coupa Software Reports Q4 Non-Gaap Earnings Per Share $0.02 Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Coupa Software Inc: * COUPA SOFTWARE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER & FULL YEAR FISCAL 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.02 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.16 * Q4 REVENUE $53.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $48.7 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.15 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES Q1 2019 REVENUE $51 MILLION TO $51.5 MILLION * SEES Q1 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $0.11 LOSS AND $0.13 LOSS PER SHARE * ‍NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $0.11 LOSS AND $0.13 LOSS PER SHARE IN Q1 2019​ * SEES FY NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $0.23 LOSS AND $0.28 LOSS PER SHARE * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.11, REVENUE VIEW $49.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.29, REVENUE VIEW $227.0 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
